LL powmod(LL a,LL b)
{
    if(b==0)return 1;
    LL x=powmod(a,b/2);
    LL y=(x*x)%MOD;
    if(b%2)
        return (a*y)%MOD;
    return y%MOD;
}
LL fact[N],ifact[N];
void precal() {
    fact[0]=1;ifact[0]=1;
    REP(i,1,N) {
        fact[i]=(fact[i-1]*i*1LL)%MOD;
    }
    REP(i,1,N) {
        ifact[i]=powmod(fact[i],MOD-2);
    }
}
int main()
{	
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--) {
        int n,k,x,y;
        cin>>n>>k;
        REP(i,0,n-1)
            cin>>x>>y;
        precal();
        LL ans=0;
        REP(i,0,min(n,k)) {
            LL ans1=(fact[n-1]*ifact[i])%MOD;
            ans1=(ans1*ifact[n-1-i])%MOD;
            ans1=(ans1*fact[k])%MOD;
            ans1=(ans1*ifact[i+1])%MOD;
            ans1=(ans1*ifact[k-i-1])%MOD;
            ans1=(ans1*fact[i+1])%MOD;
            ans=(ans+ans1)%MOD;
        }
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
